channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Guardium
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Guardium

item.title: CVE-2021-20418|2024-09-16T17:27:50.538Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 196279.

item.title: CVE-2021-20386|2024-09-16T19:56:54.084Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 195767.

item.title: CVE-2020-4183|2024-09-16T17:27:57.277Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 174739.

item.title: CVE-2020-4187|2024-09-16T19:14:51.913Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.1 could disclose sensitive information on the login page that could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 174805.

item.title: CVE-2021-20426|2024-09-16T16:58:49.386Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 196313.

item.title: CVE-2017-1598|2024-09-16T16:33:12.166Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 Database Activity Monitor uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 132611.

item.title: CVE-2017-1600|2024-09-16T16:49:10.142Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 Database Activity Monitor is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 132613.

item.title: CVE-2018-1498|2024-09-16T19:41:33.648Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium EcoSystem 10.5 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 141223.

item.title: CVE-2017-1257|2024-09-16T19:50:47.767Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 124684.

item.title: CVE-2020-4690|2024-09-16T20:31:47.673Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 186697.

item.title: CVE-2018-1889|2024-09-16T18:28:26.440Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 and 10.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 152080.

item.title: CVE-2021-20377|2024-09-16T20:21:36.250Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 195569.

item.title: CVE-2021-29735|2024-09-16T20:52:03.637Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.5, 10.6, 11.0, 11.1, 11.2, and 11.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2017-1597|2024-09-16T16:34:00.796Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0, 10.0.1, 10.1, 10.1.2, 10.1.3, 10.1.4, and 10.5 Database Activity Monitor does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 132610.

item.title: CVE-2020-4180|2024-09-16T16:33:37.117Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.1 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 174735.

item.title: CVE-2020-4307|2024-09-16T16:24:19.325Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.1 could allow an attacker on the same network to gain access to the Solr dashboard and cause a denial of service attack. IBM X-Force ID: 176997.

item.title: CVE-2020-4952|2024-09-16T18:39:01.076Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 could allow an authenticated user to gain root access due to improper access control. IBM X-Force ID: 192028.

item.title: CVE-2020-4177|2024-09-16T18:43:50.702Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.1 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 174732.

item.title: CVE-2019-4292|2024-09-16T18:24:35.617Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.5 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable web server. IBM X-Force ID: 160698.

item.title: CVE-2020-4679|2024-09-16T20:59:02.628Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 186424.

item.title: CVE-2021-20428|2024-09-16T20:26:30.988Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 196315.

item.title: CVE-2020-4191|2024-09-16T17:24:14.377Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 174852.

item.title: CVE-2020-4680|2024-09-16T16:23:05.394Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 186426.

item.title: CVE-2017-1267|2024-09-16T18:23:34.556Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 and 10.1 processes patches, image backups and other updates without sufficiently verifying the origin and integrity of the code. IBM X-Force ID: 124742.

item.title: CVE-2021-20419|2024-09-16T17:49:02.842Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 196280.

item.title: CVE-2017-1268|2024-09-16T16:58:16.273Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10 and 10.5 uses a one-way cryptographic hash against an input that should not be reversible, such as a password, but the software does not also use a salt as part of the input. IBM X-Force ID: 124743.

item.title: CVE-2017-1595|2024-09-16T18:13:00.443Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 Database Activity Monitor could allow a local attacker to obtain highly sensitive information via unspecified vectors. IBM X-Force ID: 132549.

item.title: CVE-2017-1272|2024-09-16T17:23:10.744Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 and 10.5 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 124747. IBM X-Force ID: 124747.

item.title: CVE-2020-4185|2024-09-16T20:53:06.796Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.5, 10.6, and 11.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 174803.

item.title: CVE-2017-1258|2024-09-16T20:51:49.658Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 and 10.1 does not perform an authentication check for a critical resource or functionality allowing anonymous users access to protected areas. IBM X-Force ID: 124685

item.title: CVE-2021-20385|2024-09-16T16:32:51.559Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 195766.

item.title: CVE-2021-39078|2024-09-16T16:33:32.644Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.5 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 215589.

item.title: CVE-2019-4422|2024-09-16T18:09:11.611Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 9.0, 9.5, and 10.6 are vulnerable to a privilege escalation which could allow an authenticated user to change the accessmgr password. IBM X-Force ID: 162768.

item.title: CVE-2023-47712|2024-08-02T21:16:43.649Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges on the system due to improper permissions control. IBM X-Force ID: 271527.

item.title: CVE-2023-47710|2024-08-02T21:16:43.555Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.

item.title: CVE-2023-47717|2024-08-02T21:16:43.549Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.

item.title: CVE-2023-47709|2024-08-02T21:16:43.642Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 271524.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-08-02T21:16:43.656Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-07-23T21:00:38.139Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 271524.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges on the system due to improper permissions control. IBM X-Force ID: 271527.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-05-11T13:18:21.646Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.

item.title: CVE-2023-47717|2024-06-04T17:26:34.287Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.
